banner.presentation: Currently working as a developer analyst at ITS4U, I enjoy exploring new technologies and adapting to their evolution to continually improve. I'm building skills in software analysis and design, while also perfecting my Java and Spring Boot expertise, which helps me tackle complex projects effectively. I value teamwork greatly and enjoy progressing alongside my colleagues to achieve more together. I’m confident that my skills and passion for IT will allow me to make a meaningful contribution to innovative and exciting projects.
